alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Frontier, southern Chase and Hayes Counties through 345 PM CDT/245 PM MDT/... At 238 PM CDT/138 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Lamar to 8 miles northwest of Stratton to near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Hamlet, Quick, Center Dam Campground, Willow View Campground, Freedom, Orafino, Area A Campground, Bluegill Haven Campground and Red Willow Reservoir State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 44. Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
